'''Talisman of Waxaklahun Ubah Kan''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after defeating [[Pacal (Enemy)|Pacal]] during the {{Quest|Rite of the Bold}}. It is used as an offering in the following quest, ''[[Revelations from the Past]]''.
